text: The 2016 Summer Paralympics (), the 15th Summer Paralympic Games, were a major international multi-sport event for athletes with disabilities. It was held in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, from 7 to 18 September 2016. The Games was the first time a Latin American and South American city hosted the event, the second Southern Hemisphere city and nation, the first one being the 2000 Summer Paralympics in Sydney. These Games saw the introduction of two new sports to the Paralympic program: canoeing and the paratriathlon. ==References==
title: 2016 Summer Paralympics
